title: Brasília Defense System
text:
When you rez this ice during a run on this server, you may pay 1[credit] to trash one installed non-icebreaker Runner card with a [trash] ability.
When the Runner approaches this ice you may rerez it. (Derez and then rez this piece of ice, paying all costs.)
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.
